_sText:
1..2..3... RACE

In this map both teams have to race to the end while trying not to get hit/killed/slowed down by props

first one there gets to press a button that breaks the bridge killing the other team.

---------------


don't base the map on the screen shots. play first, then rate. 







-----------
release note's:

version - a4

- Fixed most bugs in spawn

- mMre tweaking.

version - a3

- Made it a bit harder

- Did some tweaking


version - a2

-release
